title: Fix Registry Distributed Suite Failure
overview:
Distributed registry tests fail because distributed nodes can't initialize properly. single_node test and multi_node group both failing.

**Motivation:** Distributed registry functionality is critical for multi-node deployments. Without tests, this functionality is unverified.

**Success criteria:**
- Root cause identified and documented
- Distributed node setup fixed
- single_node test passes
- multi_node group init passes
- rebar3 ct --suite=erlmcp_registry_dist_SUITE executes

**Technical constraints:**
- Check distributed node setup in init_per_suite/1
- Check if slave nodes are being spawned
- Check network connectivity between nodes
- Check epmd (Erlang Port Mapper Daemon) availability
- Check cookie authentication

**Signals:** priority: critical, urgency: P0 - BLOCKS INTEGRATION TESTING
